chatbot.modules.v1.FlowSettings.jsonsche.description: FlowSettings controls static flow execution behavior

maxGotoDepth.description:
Maximum depth for chained goto executions (default: 10)
 Prevents infinite loops in node graphs

useFallbackWhenNoMatch.description: Whether to use fallback response when no node matches (default: true)
